Welcome to PyEst's documentation!
================================

.. image:: image/pyest_logo.png
   :width: 200px
   :align: center
   :alt: pyest logo

PyEst is a Python package for adaptive Gaussian mixture state estimation.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   installation
   usage
   api
   examples
   contributing

PyEst source code is available at `GitHub <https://github.com/scope-lab/pyest>`_
